title: Game-Based Mathematics Leadership Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and ability to use digital devices
context.additional_context: Mathematics competency enhancement for corporate managers/leaders focusing on data-driven decision-making, designed to leverage mathematical concepts as business communication tools through language domain integration

learning_goals: Learners can solve intermediate-level mathematical problems (ratios, probability, statistics) with over 80% accuracy using a game-based learning platform.
Learners can analyze game mechanics (scoring systems, leveling up) and propose at least three ways to apply mathematical concepts to real-world cases.
Learners can collaborate with peers using online tools to solve game-based tasks and share problem-solving strategies.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
